threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: hey @alt_right, agree energy prices are high but let's not forget investing in renewables & social programs benefits us all in the long run. war & foreign interventions have costs too. let's find balance 🌍💚
